link.title: Welcome to Oak Park and River Forest High School | Oak Park and River Forest High School

a.span: Click here to visit our Covid-19 Info Center, with school updates, info on food assistance, mental health resources, and much more.

img.alt: Oak Park and River Forest High School small
Oak Park and River Forest High School

ul.class: csw cs-icon-group cs-icon-sm cs-icon-center cs-icon-default cs-icon-bg-default cs-icon-text-default

div.p: This site provides information using PDF, visit this link to download the Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software.
Plus links to additional resources.
The Oak Park and River Forest High School Faculty Senate Executive Committee and Freshman Class Council are collecting donations virtually for Beyond Hunger.
Click here to support.
Click here for more information, including instructions on how to receive volunteer information from College Connections.
Questions? Email collegeconnection@oprfhs.org.
Click here for full schedule.
Register here by April 29.
Contact your social worker for more information. Email socialworkersstudentservices@oprfhs.org.
Do you have a substance abuse question or concern? Email gcolamussi@oprfhs.org.
Click here to learn more about QuaranTEEN Meetups.
Text licensed mental health clinicians about any issue, including anxiety, depression, substance use, and more. Download the Support4U app here.

p.strong: Oak Park and River Forest Township Covid-19 Guide

div.p: The Community Mental Health Board has prepared this frequently updated guide to resources that are providing a wealth of supports during the Covid-19 pandemic.

img.alt: Food Assistance During the Covid-19 Crisis

div.div: Food Assistance During the Covid-19 Crisis

div.p: If you or someone you know is out of the Beyond Hunger service area, you can find your nearest food pantry by contacting:
Greater Chicago Food Depository or 773-247-3663
Click here for media coverage of OPRF's efforts to serve our community during the Covid-19 crisis.

ul.li: OPRFHS E-Learning Days run from 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.
To be marked present each day, please complete the Attendance form by 3:00 p.m. It is located on the Remote Learning web page here.
Teachers are available for online office hours from 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.
Online office hours are conducted using email or Remind messages.
